headline: Assessing FedEx (FDX) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum And Mixed Fair Value Signals
summary: FedEx (FDX) is back in focus for investors as recent share performance and fresh financial figures put its core delivery and logistics business under the spotlight, inviting a closer look at valuation and fundamentals. See our latest analysis for FedEx. The recent 90 day share price return of 20.96% and 30 day share price return of 6.87% suggest momentum has picked up. At the same time, the 1 year total shareholder return of 9.53% and 3 year total shareholder return of 64.79% provide a...
